tools.title: json-server
tools.description: Fake REST API based on a json schema. Useful for mocking and creating APIs for front-end devs to consume in coding challenges.

tools.title: Notion
tools.description: Is an application and service of notes with support of discounts that integrates tasks, wikis and databases.

tools.title: Whimscall
tools.description: Whimsical is a unified suite of collaboration tools. Great for product specs, wikis, brainstorming, ideation, user flows, architecture diagrams and more
